name: Forgotten Seas
storyline: The premise of the game is simple: you are lost in the Bermuda Triangle, and you have to figure your way out while facing myriad threats and mysteries. Land is scarce, ephemeral oceanic anomalies keep you on your toes, and mysterious islands appear and disappear. Overall, Pirates of Pangea will test your planning, survival, base building and combat skills to the fullest.
summary: Craft a 'Ship in a Bottle' and set sail! You are lost in a Bermuda Triangle void. Land is scarce, and the ocean is treacherous. Dread Pirates rule the seas. Experience a survival adventure filled with sailing, plundering, base-building, crafting, treasure hunting, trading, and Pirate Ship combat.
